metadata.title: CVE-2021-29982 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Due to incorrect JIT optimization, we incorrectly interpreted data from thewrong type of object, resulting in the potential leak of a single bit ofmemory. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 91 and Thunderbird < 91.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
